subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Paralympic Games
lead_paragraph: Barbara Buchan, at 52 the oldest member of the U.S. Paralympic team, broke the world record and won the gold medal in the individual 3000-meter cycling pursuit.
snippet: Barbara Buchan, at 52 the oldest member of the U.S. Paralympic team, broke the world record and won the gold medal in the individual 3000-meter cycling pursuit.
